mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_NUM AS orderNum, -- 발령 번호 O.APPOINTMENT_DATE AS appointmentDate, -- 발령 일자 E.EMP_NUM AS empNum, -- 사번 E.EMP_NAME AS empName, -- 성명 P_PREV.POS_NAME AS previousPosition, -- 이전 직위 P_NEW.POS_NAME AS newPosition, -- 발령 직위 D_PREV.DEPT_NAME AS previousDepartment, -- 이전 부서 D_NEW.DEPT_NAME AS newDepartment, -- 발령 부서 R_PREV.ROLE_NAME AS previousRole, -- 이전 직책 R_NEW.ROLE_NAME AS newRole, -- 발령 직책 O.ORDER_SITUATION AS orderSituation -- 발령 구분 FROM ORDERS O JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON O.EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM LEFT JOIN POSITIONS P_PREV ON P_PREV.POS_NUM = E.POS_NUM -- 현재 직위 LEFT JOIN POSITIONS P_NEW ON P_NEW.POS_NUM = O.POS_NUM -- 발령 직위 LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D_PREV ON D_PREV.DEPT_NUM = E.DEPT_NUM -- 현재 부서 LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D_NEW ON D_NEW.DEPT_NUM = O.DEPARTMENT_NUM -- 발령 부서 LEFT JOIN ROLE R_PREV ON R_PREV.ROLE_NUM = E.ROLE_NUM -- 현재 직책 LEFT JOIN ROLE R_NEW ON R_NEW.ROLE_NUM = O.ROLE_NUM -- 발령 직책 ORDER BY O.APPOINTMENT_DATE ASC; -- 발령 일자 기준으로 정렬
